data.eml:eml: Description of two new Discocelis species (Polycladida: Acotylea: Discocelidae) from the Persian Gulf with a review of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maghsoudlou, Abdolvahab, Rahimian, Hassan (2013): Description of two new Discocelis species (Polycladida: Acotylea: Discocelidae) from the Persian Gulf with a review of the genus. Zootaxa 3683 (3): 247-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3683.3.2
